text: Yastava jo koni, tumacyajavala he jnana ye'una pohocalyanantarahi tumacyasi yababata vada ghalila tara tumhi sanga ki ya amhi ani tumhi apapalya putranna ani amhi va tumhi apapalya patninna ani amhi va tumhi svatah apalyala bolavuna ghe'u, maga amhi sarva miluna du'a (prarthana) karu ya ani khotya lokanvara allahaca dhihkkara pathavu ya
